emailvalidation.title: It'sYou.Online email verification
emailvalidation.text: To verify your email address %s on ItsYou.Online, click the button below.
emailvalidation.reason: You’re receiving this email because you recently created a new ItsYou.Online account or added a new email address. If this wasn’t you, please ignore this email.
emailvalidation.subject: ItsYou.Online email verification
emailvalidation.urlcaption: Button not working? Paste the following link into your browser:

passwordreset.title: It's You Online password reset
passwordreset.text: To reset your ItsYou.Online password, click the button below.
passwordreset.reason: You’re receiving this email because you recently requested to reset your password at ItsYou.Online. If this wasn’t you, please ignore this email.
passwordreset.subject: ItsYou.Online password reset
passwordreset.urlcaption: Button not working? Paste the following link into your browser:

organizationinvite.title: It's You Online organization invitation
organizationinvite.text: You have been invited to the %s organization on It's You Online. Click the button below to accept the invitation.
organizationinvite.reason: You’re receiving this email because someone invited you to an organization at ItsYou.Online. If you think this was a mistake please ignore this email.
organizationinvite.subject: You have been invited to the %s organization
organizationinvite.urlcaption: Button not working? Paste the following link into your browser:

smsconfirmation: To verify your phonenumber on itsyou.online enter the code %s in the form or use this link: %s?c=%s&k=%s&l=%s
smsconfirmationandlogin: To verify your phonenumber on itsyou.online and continue to login, enter the code %s in the form or use this link: %s?c=%s&k=%s&l=%s
authorizeorganizationsms: To continue signing in at itsyou.online to authorize the organization %s, enter the code %s in the form or use this link: https://%s/sc?c=%s&k=%s&l=%s
signinsms: To continue signing in at itsyou.online enter the code %s in the form or use this link: https://%s/sc?c=%s&k=%s&l=%s
smsloggingin: You will be logged in within a few seconds
error: An unexpected error occurred, please try again later
smsconfirmedandlogin: Your phonenumber is confirmed, and you will be logged in within a few seconds
